interpretation:
The "Chart Decreasing" card represents a period of loss or decline. It indicates that things may not be going as planned and that you may be experiencing a downward trend in your life. This could be in your finances, career, relationships, or even your health. It's important to acknowledge this decline and take steps to address it.

This card can also be a warning to be cautious with your investments or financial decisions. It's a reminder to keep an eye on your spending and avoid taking unnecessary risks.

In a relationship reading, this card could indicate a decline in the relationship or a period of conflict. It's important to address any issues and communicate openly with your partner to work towards a resolution.

Overall, the "Chart Decreasing" card is a reminder to stay grounded and focused during times of difficulty. It's an opportunity to reassess your goals and make necessary changes to get back on track.
